Author: cornycorncorny
Text: She sounds toxic and insensitive. I recommend cutting ties off with her completely, but if you can't don't talk about exercise, calories or any type of food related subjects with her and your group of friends. It seems like that type of stuff excites her and if she brings it up herself, change the subject. But then again, I wouldn't want to be near anyone who acts like that so please don't consider her a friend
